img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/55/Wukong_UpperHollow_32.jpg)
Once he's defeated, you can lure down the first of several Puppet Spiders just past the stairs, but be sure to also turn around to find a small path up to an alcove with a green Wisp, and a ledge that will drop you back into the hanging cocoon passage.
img_below_text:
Continue up the long rounded path luring out the Puppet Spiders one at a time, and eventually you'll reach the far side of the large platform you saw across from the houses near the Upper Hollow Shrine.
![Wukong UpperHollow 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Wukong_UpperHollow_33.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/55/Wukong_UpperHollow_32.jpg)
Once he's defeated, you can lure down the first of several Puppet Spiders just past the stairs, but be sure to also turn around to find a small path up to an alcove with a green Wisp, and a ledge that will drop you back into the hanging cocoon passage."
            - Following Text: "Continue up the long rounded path luring out the Puppet Spiders one at a time, and eventually you'll reach the far side of the large platform you saw across from the houses near the Upper Hollow Shrine.
![Wukong UpperHollow 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Wukong_UpperHollow_33.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a gameplay scene from "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist is engaged in combat with a Puppet Spider in the Upper Hollow area. The preceding text describes the strategy of luring down Puppet Spiders and exploring an alcove with a green Wisp, while the following text advises continuing up a path to encounter more Puppet Spiders and reach a large platform near the Upper Hollow Shrine. The image serves to illustrate the combat mechanics and environment of this section of the game.
